alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Drew; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 11:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Desha, southeastern Monroe, east central Drew and southeastern Arkansas Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near De Witt to near McGehee. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rohwer... Gillett... Arkansas City... St. Charles... Tillar... Watson... Yancopin... Lucca Landing... McGehee... Merrisach Lake... Kelso... Trusten Holder WMA... De Witt... Reed... Baxter... Arkansas Post... De Luce... Tichnor... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Masonville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
